verses.kjv: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.
verses.ct: Praise is waiting for you in Zion, O God, and our promises to you will be fulfilled.

verses.kjv: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.
verses.ct: You are the one who answers prayer, and all people will come to you.

verses.kjv: Iniquities prevail against me: as for our transgressions, thou shalt purge them away.
verses.ct: My sins have overwhelmed me, but you will wipe away our transgressions.

verses.kjv: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.
verses.ct: How happy is the person you choose and bring near to you, to live in your courts. We will be filled with the goodness of your house, your holy temple.

verses.kjv: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off upon the sea:
verses.ct: You answer us with awesome acts of righteousness, O God of our salvation. You are the hope of everyone on earth and those far away across the sea.

verses.kjv: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains; being girded with power:
verses.ct: By your strength you established the mountains, clothed with power.

verses.kjv: Which stilleth the noise of the seas, the noise of their waves, and the tumult of the people.
verses.ct: You calm the roaring of the seas, the crashing of their waves, and the uproar of the nations.

verses.kjv: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.
verses.ct: Those who live at the farthest edges of the earth stand in awe of your signs. You make the places where morning and evening dawn shout with joy.

verses.kjv: Thou visitest the earth, and waterest it: thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God, which is full of water: thou preparest them corn, when thou hast so provided for it.
verses.ct: You care for the earth and water it; you make it incredibly rich. God's river is full of water. You provide grain for the people, because you have prepared the land for it.

verses.kjv: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.
verses.ct: You drench its plowed rows and level its ridges. You soften it with rain showers and bless everything that grows from it.

verses.kjv: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.
verses.ct: You crown the year with your abundance, and wherever you go, prosperity overflows.

verses.kjv: They drop upon the pastures of the wilderness: and the little hills rejoice on every side.
verses.ct: The wild grasslands overflow with plenty, and the hills are wrapped in celebration.

verses.kjv: The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.
verses.ct: The meadows are covered with flocks, and the valleys are blanketed with grain. They burst out in shouts of joy â€” they even sing!
